content: sew hole closed wings make 2 using black yarn round 1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 4 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next repeat all 6 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat all 8 single_crochet rounds 4-5 single_crochet in every st around 8 single_crochet round 6 hide beginning tail pinch sides together and close the hole by doing 4 single_crochet across fasten_off with long tail and sew on body on round 7 last black round at the side of the body feet make 2 using yellow yarn round 1 chain 2 8 single_crochet 2nd chain from hook 8 single_crochet round 2 single_crochet in every st around 8 single_crochet round 3 hide beginning tail pinch sides together and work 4 single_crochet across to close hole sew to the front side of the bottom of the body fasten_off and hide all ends hope you enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions about my pattern please contact me at petalsandbows@gmail com you can follow me on facebook at https //www facebook com/petalsandbows copyright 2022 erica townsend this pattern may not be copied sold or given away without the express written permission of the author products made using this pattern are the property of the maker and may be sold traded or given away and are not covered by this copyright
